name: hometube
description: Hometube is a self hosted YouTube like interface for watching local video files. It scans directories, generates thumbnails and presents videos in a responsive grid, making a private streaming front end for your media library.
features: YouTube-Style Interface: Browse local videos with a familiar, grid-based layout.
Automatic Scanning: Scan directories and automatically index video files.
Thumbnail Generation: Create video thumbnails for visual browsing experience.
Responsive Grid: Adaptive layout that works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Video Playback: Stream videos directly in the browser with HTML5 player.
Metadata Display: Show video duration, file size, and other information.
Search Functionality: Find videos quickly by filename or metadata.
Private Streaming: Host your own video platform without uploading to public services.
